column5: I am heading up to a buds cottage on Jacks lake ( Apsly) this weekend and Just curious if anyone has been there lately and what advice you could offer. Got into some nice walleye last time I was there ice fishing but this time I was hoping to target the Crappie. Thanks AL
Check the regs before fishing Jacks lake. The top section might already be closed for the ice season because it's also a sanctuary. The lower sections are open though.
There are crappie in Redmond bay near the northeast corner (although I ahve never fished for them through the ice)
I think it might already be closed!
Thanks for the heads up on the closures. The cottage that I will be at is in the southern portion.
